Entries.130: Basic/The Pirate Widow/An old lady living on Ginger Island is asking you to find a keepsake of her husband's. She gave you an old photograph of a soldier that washed up on shore, hoping it would help in some way./Find a keepsake that belonged to Birdie's husband./-1/-1/0/-1/false

Entries.Birdie0: Ahh, another new face on our little island... it's almost getting crowded, hehe!
Entries.Birdie1: There was once a great civilisation of dwarves on this island. You can see the ruins of their strange machines in the volcano. But be careful!
Entries.Birdie2: If you're ever feeling queasy in the stomach, a bite of ginger does wonders!
Entries.Birdie3: Have you been to the secret shrine in the jungle? The flowers there smell lovely... It's one of my favorite spots on the island.$h
Entries.Birdie4: Every morning for breakfast, I have a bowl of poi and a glass of freshly squeezed mango juice. It keeps me young!
Entries.Birdie5: I walk the beach every day to see if anything new has washed ashore. There's a lot floating around out there and it shouldn't go to waste!
Entries.Birdie6: My hut may be small, but it's more than enough for what I need. And best of all, I built it myself!
Entries.Birdie8: The Joja cargo ships sometimes pass nearby. They're rich targets for pirates, hehehe...
Entries.Birdie12: Leo's a sweet boy. Confused, but sweet. I keep telling him, a growing boy can't live on walnuts alone!
Entries.Birdie15: Fruit, fish, and foraged food... It's a good diet! I feel as healthy as ever.
Entries.Birdie17: The weather here is warm and lovely year round... perfect for these old bones...
Entries.Birdie19: Have you seen the little banana altar in the jungle? If I had a banana I'd set it there and see what happens... heh heh...$h
Entries.Birdie22: Hello, dear... you look healthy and in good spirits today!$h
Entries.Birdie23: I was born only a few islands over from here, you know. I'd stand at the shore, watching this same big blue sea... That was a long time ago.
Entries.Birdie26: Leo's the closest thing I have to family now. He's half wild, but there's worse things to be!
Entries.Birdie28: It's a full moon tonight... Whether your fortune be good or bad, be on the alert, my dear - the spirits are restless!
Entries.Birdie_NoGift: Oh, no no no... I don't need any gifts, my dear. You keep it.
